description:
A performance base layer for active adventure in cold weather, the Rho Hybrid’s Phasic™ AR II material stretches, provides thermal comfort, and is made with wicking fibres. Merino wool panels are placed in high-odour areas – something that’s appreciated on multiday trips – and the fit layers easily and is patterned for maximum mobility.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of our commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Rho Hybrid Crew - Mens

specs.value: Phasic™ AR II – 100% polyester with FC0 yarn and DAO™ finish

specs.key: Contains wool certified to the Responsible Wool Standard (RWS)
specs.value: RWS is a voluntary program that helps sheep farmers meet consumer, retailer, and brand demands. The standard certifies they meet rigorous animal welfare and land management requirements.
